GAP Audio System Compound List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
  • AudioMgrInit (Initialization structure for the IAudioManager class)
  • AudioMgrStats (Statistics structure for the IAudioManager class)
  • AudioScriptInit (Initialization structure for the IAudioScript class)
  • BackgroundInit (Struct used for initializing a background looping element)
  • DLSInit (Initialization structure for the IDLS class)
  • EAXBufferProps (EAXBufferProps is used to set all EAX buffer properties at once)
  • EAXListenerProps (EAXListenerProps is used to set all EAX listener properties at once)
  • IAudioBase (Base class defining common interface of all managed audio components)
  • IAudioManager (The audio manager controls all low-level audio components)
  • IAudioScript (IAudioScript is the interface for DirectMusic script objects)
  • IAudioStream (IAudioStream is the internal file representation used by the audio system)
  • IAudioStreamFactory (IAudioStreamFactory is a factory template used to create IAudioStream files)
  • IDLS (Interface structure for DLS collections)
  • IEAXBuffer (Public EAX buffer interface extension)
  • IEAXListener (Public EAX listener interface extension)
  • IListener (IListener represents the listener around which 3D sounds are oriented and positioned)
  • IMusicCallback (Music callback interface)
  • IMusicManager (High-level music management interface class)
  • IPlayable (Base class defining common interface of all playable audio components)
  • ISegment (ISegment is the interface for segment audio objects)
  • ISound (ISound is the interface for 2D sound objects)
  • ISound3D (ISound3D is the interface for 3D sound objects)
  • ISoundManager (Controls and manages high-level sound objects)
  • ISoundScape (Class defining a collection of sounds which make up a soundscape)
  • IZoomFX (Public ZoomFX buffer interface extension)
  • ListenerInit (This structure contains all parameters needed for the IListener initialization)
  • ListenerProp (This structure contains all the 3D properties of the listener)
  • PeriodicInit (Struct used for initializing a peroidic element)
  • SegmentInit (Initialization structure for the ISegment class)
  • Sound3DInit (Initialization structure for the 3D ISound3D class)
  • Sound3DProp (Property class representing all commonly modified run-time sound properties)
  • SoundInit (2D sound initialization structure)
  • SoundProp (2D sound properties structure)
  • ZoomFXBox (ZoomFXBox is used to set all ZoomFX orientation properties)
  • ZoomFXOrientation (ZoomFXOrientation is used to set all ZoomFX orientation properties)
  • ZoomFXProps (ZoomFXProps is used to set all ZoomFX buffer properties at once)
